title: Information Technology Manager
description:
**Rollen som IT-ansvarig på DeltaNordic i Stockholm (Kungsängen)** 




  





 Nu söker vi efter en driven person som vill vara med och leda företagets digitaliseringsresa genom att utveckla IT funktionen och implementera IT-roadmapen för att möjliggöra fortsatt tillväxt. Du kommer att arbeta på plats i Stockholm (Kungsängen), men resor till kollegorna i Örnsköldsvik kommer att förekomma.
 



  





 DeltaNordic är ett framgångsrikt företag med verksamhet i Örnsköldsvik, Stockholm och Kina som utvecklar och tillverkar elektronik med egna eller inköpta komponenter efter kundernas önskemål. Exempel på produkter kan vara elektronik som installeras i olika fordon, eller i utrustning för att styra en kran eller borr i otillgängliga miljöer.
 



 I det dagliga arbetet kommer du att jobba nära verksamheten med att hantera och fortsätta utveckla företagets IT-miljö (digital arbetsplats, verksamhetsapplikationer och infrastruktur såsom servrar, skrivare, nätverk mm). Du kommer även att koordinera och styra externa leverantörer och partners. Du rapporterar till företagets CFO.
 



  





**Arbetsuppgifter** 



* Leda och utveckla IT-funktion och servicedesk efter verksamhetens behov.
* Vidareutveckla företagets IT-roadmap samt leda arbetet med genomförande.
* Kartlägga, inventera och upphandla leverantörer och samarbetspartners för att säkerställa kostnadseffektiv leverans av IT-tjänster.
* Ansvara för informations- och cybersäkerhet för att skydda organisationen samt leva upp till kunders säkerhetskrav.
* Kontroll, översyn och inköp av licenser och regelbunden kapacitetsplanering.
* Säkerställa stabil och pålitlig drift av infrastruktur och applikationer inkl. kontinuitetsplaner vid oväntade händelser.
* Tillse att den digitala arbetsmiljön på kontoren är modern, väl fungerande och stödjer verksamheten på bästa sätt.
* Koordinera applikationsportföljen och säkerställa ett tydligt ägarskap för applikationerna.
* Budget- och personalansvar över IT-funktionen



  





**Nu söker vi dig som har god erfarenhet av:** 



* Leda eller arbetat med digital arbetsplats och servicedesk.
* Infrastruktur & nätverk för både cloud och on prem miljöer.
* Microsoft AD, EntraID (AzureAD) och Intune.
* Informations- och cybersäkerhet.
* IT processer, IT styrning och IT strategi.
* Office365 och Exchange online.
* Skapa och underhålla teknisk dokumentation och användarguider.
* Erfarenhet av Monitor ERP är meriterande.
* Erfarenhet av tillverkande industri är meriterande.



  





**Din profil** 



* Du är en lagspelare som aktivt bidrar till hela företagets leverans.
* Du har ordningssinne och är strukturerad, i tal och skrift.
* Du är kommunicerande, självgående och serviceinriktad.
* Du kan driva frågor proaktivt med olika intressenter inom och utanför företaget.
* Vi ser gärna att du har intresse för utveckling av IT-strategi.
* Du talar och skriver svenska och engelska flytande.
* Rollen kan innebära säkerhetsprövning/bakgrundskontroll.



  





**Varför DeltaNordic?** 




 DeltaNordic är ett privatägt industriföretag, grundat 1949 med verksamhet i Örnsköldsvik, Stockholm och Kina. Företaget agerar som utvecklings-, produktions- & logistikpartner av elektriska och elektroniska komponenter och system för industriföretag på en internationell marknad. Kunderna finns representerade inom branscher såsom Försvar & Säkerhet, Energi, Miljö, Infrastruktur, IT, Hissar, Marin, Gruv, Förpackningar och Råvaror.
 



  





 DeltaNordic har en stabil tillväxt och har ca 150 anställda. Huvudkontor i Örnsköldsvik.
 



  





 DeltaNordic bidrar till en hållbar utveckling genom hållbara material och produktions­processer. Kärnvärden som speglar företagskulturen är Kundfokus, Ansvar, Tro på framtiden och Yrkesstolthet.
 



  





**Ansökan** 




 I denna rekrytering samarbetar DeltaNordic med Quadruped Rekrytering. Hör av dig med frågor eller skicka din ansökan till carina.ronnby@quadruped.se alt 0761017770. Urval och intervjuer sker löpande. Vill du veta mer är du välkommen att kontakta oss!

title: Systems Engineering Manager - Sweden
description:
**Company Description**
**Our Mission**
 At Palo Alto Networks® everything starts and ends with our mission:
   

  

 Being the cybersecurity partner of choice, protecting our digital way of life.
   

  

 Our vision is a world where each day is safer and more secure than the one before. We are a company built on the foundation of challenging and disrupting the way things are done, and we’re looking for innovators who are as committed to shaping the future of cybersecurity as we are.
   

  

**Our Approach to Work**
 We lead with flexibility and choice in all of our people programs. We have disrupted the traditional view that all employees have the same needs and wants. We offer personalization and offer our employees the opportunity to choose what works best for them as often as possible - from your wellbeing support to your growth and development, and beyond!
   

  

**Job Description**
**Your Career**
 As our Systems Engineering Manager, you are the technical leader for your District Systems Engineering team. You will work closely with the District Sales Manager and, along with your team, build relationships with your customers with the goal of helping them detect and prevent advanced cyberattacks and breaches. Our customers need guidance on what applications to deploy from our platform. Your guidance, expertise, and mentorship of your team of SEs will keep them ahead of the latest cyberthreats and staying on the leading edge of prevention.
   

  

 We are looking for a leader to develop our presales teams, providing training and technical support as a product expert. Additionally, you will provide feedback to the product management team on new feature requests and product improvements based on what you learn from your customer base. Your team, in partnership with the sales account managers, will displace competitor technologies and build market share within your targeted list of major accounts, and most importantly, help your client sleep at night as they use our products to build secure digital transactions.
   

  

**Your Impact**
* Recruit, train, and mentor systems engineers in the territory, keeping team members engaged and successful in their careers
* Build and maintain relationships with customers to solidify reference accounts and to assist the account teams with defining plans to drive more business
* Support field SE team in complex evaluations/ proof-of-value, troubleshooting, and challenges found in client environments
* Deliver highly technical, strategic content to external audiences to help educate and empower our clients, partners, and employees
* Develop relationships with channel partners and their technical teams to ensure colleagues are appropriately trained and can support our installations
* Act as an escalation point for pre-sales and post-sales technical issues that arise
* Lead conversations about industry trends and emerging changes to the security landscape that every customer needs to plan for
* Provide design consultation and standard methodology mentorship for rollout, implementation, and policy conversion during the 'pre-sales' process for strategic opportunities
* Provide onboarding, training, and mentoring to develop your new and established team members to maintain a high level of technical capability and independence
* Influence sales process by partnering with clients and prospective clients to implement best practices within their digital environments
* Assist with defining periodic SE training curriculum
* Assist Channel team in ensuring Partner SE’s are trained and can support Palo Alto Networks evaluation installation
* Working with Product Management, Technical Marketing, and R&D to build requirements and product features for our large customers and provide feedback from customers


**Qualifications**
**Your Experience**
* Demonstrated experience as a presales Systems Engineering or Consulting Engineering Manager, leading a team of experienced technical professionals
* Industry knowledge of security product market trends and directional awareness of our roadmap and technology development efforts
* Knowledge of how to deliver comprehensive security solutions to the client base, and a general understanding of competitive selling strategies
* Experience building System Engineering enablement and tools, for example - training, demos, etc
* Strong communication (written and verbal) and presentation skills
* Proficiency in Swedish language skills


**Additional Information**
**The Team**
 As part of our Systems Engineering team, you’ll support the sales team with technical expertise and guidance when establishing trust with key clients. You won’t find someone at Palo Alto Networks that isn’t committed to your success – with everyone pitching in to assist when it comes to solutions selling, learning, and development. As a member of our systems engineering team, you are motivated by a solutions-focused sales environment and find fulfillment in working with clients to resolve incredible complex cyberthreats.
   

  

**Our Commitment**
 We’re trailblazers that dream big, take risks, and challenge cybersecurity’s status quo. It’s simple: we can’t accomplish our mission without diverse teams innovating, together.
   

  

 We are committed to providing reasonable accommodations for all qualified individuals with a disability. If you require assistance or accommodation due to a disability or special need, please contact us at accommodations@paloaltonetworks.com.
   

  

 Palo Alto Networks is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity in our workplace, and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, political affiliation, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.
   

  

**Please note that we will not sponsor applicants for work visas for this position.**

title: Senior Manager within IT-Audit to KPMG IRM
description:
Do you want to work in an environment with focus on IT security, risk management, advanced data analytics and digitalization? We are looking for a Senior Manager to KPMGs Information Risk Management department (IRM) focusing on IT-Audit. A position where you can combine your personal development with delivering quality and knowledge to clients.
 



  





 Don’t miss the opportunity to be part of an international environment, a highly motivated team and an ability to build a further career working with some of the most interested companies in the market!
 



  





**The Role** 




 IRM is a fast-growing area within KPMG, full of opportunities if you are motivated to expand your carrier further within IT-audit and analytics. The teams are based in Stockholm, Göteborg and Malmö and are working within three main areas:
 



  





 – IT Audit as part of the external and internal audit.
 



 – IT Assurance assignments on cyber security, internal audit, ISO 27000, project assurance, process mining and third-party assurance via SOC reporting.
 



 – Data analytics as part of the audit approach or as assurance over our client's IT environments.
 



  





 Your key responsibilities as Senior Manager:
 


* Lead IT audit projects and risk assessments, identifying and assessing risks and controls in complex IT environments.
* Lead and manage client engagements, ensuring that work is delivered on time, within budget, and to the highest quality standards.
* Collaborate with clients to understand their business needs and develop customized solutions to meet their unique challenges.
* Lead and develop teams of professionals, providing guidance and mentorship to ensure their success and growth.
* Performance management of junior staff, including engagement-level coaching and development, and delivery of internal training and guidance materials.
* Analyze data and provide insights that drive strategic decision-making.



  





 KPMGs office is located at Vasagatan, travelling is included in the position.
 



 At KPMG, you become part of a corporate culture where the individual is important. KPMG offers great development opportunities in a diverse environment where you will be challenged through exciting and socially important involvement with clients. You are offered a varied and responsible role where the pace is often high, with many opportunities for stimulating social contacts, constant change and knowledge development. KPMG offers a comprehensive internal training and development program with the opportunity to develop within your areas of interest.
 



  





**Is this you?** 




 To be successful in this position you have previous experience from working in a similar senior position within big four, either as a Manager or Senior Manager. You have experience of delivering IT audit work as part of internal or external audits and/or SOC reports and experience of managing delivery of complex or diverse technology process and controls assurance. Furthermore you have high knowledge in identifying and assessing complex IT risks and controls, relate them to the wider business environment and to express opinions clearly to all levels of stakeholders.
 



  





 You have a university degree in a relevant field. Excellent English is a must have Swedish is a plus.
 



  





 In this recruitment, your personal qualities will be of great importance. We are looking for a senior person who has a high energy and who is willing to take on a new challenge in a position where your self-leadership is essential. We are looking for a communicating, diplomatic and pragmatic profile who are able to deal directly with internal and external clients. To be successful in the role, you need to have excellent organizational skills, being a strong decision and initiative taker. Furthermore, you are capable of working under pressure with commitment to deliver under tight deadlines.
 



  





**Do you want to know more?** 




 In this process KPMG is working with Level Recruitment. To apply, please click the apply button. If you have further questions don´t hesitate to contact recruitment consultant Christian Smith at +46 8-120 50 410 or Carolina Eskengren at +46 8 120 50 427. We will interview ongoingly so please register your application as soon as possible.
 



  





**Search** 
 : Revison, Audit, Analytic Manager, IT- audit, ISO 27000

title: IoT Business Process Analyst(ERP)
description:
🚀
 **Join Our Team VIPAS AB as an IoT Business Process Analyst** 
 🚀
 



  





  





 Do you have what it takes to thrive in the vibrant world of IT consulting? VIPAS AB, a burgeoning company, proudly invites you to embark on your next engaging project as our
 **IoT Business Process Analyst** 
**!** 




  





  





**About VIPAS:** 




  





 VIPAS AB is an IT consulting company that delivers tailored solutions using modern technologies, particularly in Java and Python. Our team has extensive experience in Java and Python application development, DevOps implementation, and software engineering. We aim to be a trusted partner in guiding organizations through the adoption of modern technologies, enabling them to achieve efficiency, scalability, and innovation in their software development and operations.
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 





 • Participate as an active project member in our IoT ERP implementation, focusing on billing, defining invoice layout, and implementation.
 





 • Be part of the customer journey development and related process transformation.
 





 • Carry out a detailed study of the company's business processes, revealing their impact on the fulfillment of the company's strategic goals.
 





 • Identify sustainable, efficient business processes and related system improvements, define business and IT requirements for their implementation.
 





 • Manage process improvement implementation projects in cooperation with the rest of the organization.
 





 • Support the introduction of new xx IoT products and services by incorporating them into existing processes and developing new processes by best practices.
 





 • Monitor the impact of xx IoT processes on xx IoT customer satisfaction throughout the customer's life cycle by analyzing customer feedback and survey results.
 





 • Ensure the maintenance and longevity of the implemented process improvements in the daily operation of xx
 





 • Evaluate the impact of changes or improvements in implemented processes on quality or customer satisfaction by defining and implementing measurable indicators (KPIs).
 




  





**Required skills and abilities:** 





 • Strong customer orientation and ability to understand the customer journey.
 





 • Experience in implementing an ERP system, with a focus on billing and invoicing.
 





 • Minimum of 4 years of experience in creating, analyzing, and implementing changes in business processes, as well as supporting applications and user information.
 





 • Higher education in business or process management.
 





 • Excellent stakeholder management skills, with the ability to fearlessly involve and contact teams within and outside of xx IoT.
 





 • Knowledge of process management methods such as Lean and BPM.
 





 • Project management experience, with the ability to manage process improvement implementation projects in cooperation with the rest of the organization.
 





 • Strategic and analytical thinking skills, with the ability to identify sustainable and efficient business processes and related system improvements.
 





 • Good communication and presentation skills, with the ability to justify one's opinion.
 





 • Very good knowledge of English, preferably also Latvian and/or Swedish (written and oral).
 





 • Good computer program skills, especially in CRM and ERP systems, MS Office, and Jira.
 




  





**Why join us :** 




  





 Vipas AB offers attractive employment packages for IT consultants, aligned with the Teknikföretagen (Almega) collective agreement.
 **We support visa sponsorship for professionals outside the EU for assignments exceeding six months** 
 . Our clients in Stockholm are leaders in system development and technology. Working with us provides opportunities in diverse industries, allowing you flexibility and growth. If you’re driven and eager to face new challenges, join the VIPAS family.
 



  





 Cutting-Edge Projects: Contribute to high-impact projects that leverage the latest in IOT, ERP, and project management.
 



 Professional Growth: Opportunities for continuous learning and advancement within a forward-thinking environment.Collaborative Culture: Work with a team that values innovation, teamwork, and a commitment to excellence
 



  





  





 Join us in shaping the future of deployment automation and making a real impact!
 



  





 #IoT #ERP #ERPImplementation #BillingSystems #InvoiceLayout #CustomerJourney #ProcessTransformation #BusinessProcesses #StrategicGoals #ProcessImprovement #SystemImprovements #ProjectManagement #IoTProducts #CustomerSatisfaction #KPI #StakeholderManagement #LeanManagement #BPM #BusinessManagement #ProcessManagement #AnalyticalThinking #CommunicationSkills #CRM #MicrosoftOffice #Jira #JobOpening #CareerOpportunity #ITConsulting #TechJobs #JoinOurTeam #JobSearch #HiringNow#vipasab
 



  





  





**Please feel free to reach me at swathi.hr@vipas.se &contact me at +46764341371/+46 739803973** 




  





  





**Note: Please do apply if you have Sweden PR/ citizenship OR a Sweden work permit.** 




  





**Please note! We offer continuously. That means that we sometimes remove the assignments before the deadline. If you are interested we recommend that you apply immediately.**

title: Cyber Security Program manager
description:
****Company Description****
 A cornerstone of H&M Group’s cyber security capabilities, the newly formed Cyber Security Program Management Unit (PMO) is tasked with overseeing the portfolio of the Cyber Security Tech Centre, and meticulously managing of large-scale strategic cyber security deliveries. This unique opportunity places you at the inception of a critical organizational endeavour, where your contributions will shape the trajectory of our cyber security footprint.
   

  

 You will report to the Head of PMO and have ample opportunities to work with senior cyber security leadership, as well as the larger organisation. (The hiring manager believes in professional growth and will actively support you to achieve such.) So, if you are prepared and excited to engage in a formal and impactful role within the realm of cyber security, we invite you to join us as we build the foundations of a secure digital future at H&M Group.
   

  

****Job Description****
 As a Cyber Security Program Manager, you are responsible for managing complex cross-cutting initiatives with a focus on cyber security, involving many parts of Business Tech and of the global business organization within H&M Group. The job includes strategic analysis and combining business acumen with technical and domain knowledge. The initiatives typically require a wide range of activities from business development to tech implementation, including new product development as well as driving, leading and coordinating participating teams from across the cyber security department and the Group, of which many are distributed globally. The job often includes strategic analysis as well as technical and functional development . Working with a focus on value creation, growth and serving customers with full ownership and accountability. Delivering exceptional customer and business results.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities:**
* Lead, manage and execute large cross-cutting cyber security projects (programs), involving a large number of teams across the H&M Group
* Collaborate with stakeholders within or cross functions, to drive joint initiatives, requiring synchronized backlogs and activities
* Responsible for planning and preparing the roll-out of programs, coordinating both with (regional) stakeholders as well as program stakeholders, ensuring alignment on dependencies and timelines
* Communicate with various stakeholders to ensure alignment of goals and tasks to ensure the overall success of the program
* Develop a thorough understanding of processes and technical issues
* Enable continuous improvement during projects, ensuring learnings are documented and shared with others


****Qualifications****
 We are looking for individuals with a commitment to excellence, a strategic mindset and a strong sense of energy to join our newly minted team.
   

  

**To succeed in this role, you will have:**
* Extensive experience using a “prgm mgmt. toolbox" of techniques such as Milestone planning, Process mapping, Planning and facilitation, change management, scheduling, root cause analysis etc.
* Moderate cyber security domain knowledge
* Ability to build relationships, delegate, empower and coach team members, with a highly collaborative work ethic
* Strong stakeholder management skills, with the ability to communicate priorities and constraints, and understand their desires & requirements
* Understanding of the core retail end-to-end processes. Processes that drive costs and/or locks up inventory, processes and behaviors that increase cyber security. Ability to put program objectives into a retail and IT process perspective.
* Experienced in agile ways of working, and ability to work with ambiguity, uncertainty or limited information
* Ability to develop the vision and mission statement and be adept at selling the program vision and benefits to the various stakeholders


****Additional Information****
 This is a full-time position based in Stockholm.
   

  

 Apply by sending in your CV in English as soon as possible, but no later than the 23rd of February. Due to data policies, we only accept applications through career page.
   

  

****Benefits****
 We offer all our employees at H&M Group attractive benefits with extensive development opportunities around the globe. All our employees receive a staff discount card, usable on all our H&M Group brands in stores and online. Brands covered by the discount are H&M (Beauty and Move included), COS, Weekday, Monki, H&M HOME, & Other Stories, ARKET, Afound. In addition to our staff discount, all our employees are included in our H&M Incentive Program – HIP. You can read more about our H&M Incentive Program here.
   

  

 In addition to our global benefits, all our local markets offer different competitive perks and benefits. Please note that they may differ between employment type and countries.
   

  

**Inclusion & Diversity**
 H&M is a part of H&M Group. At H&M Group, we’re determined to create and maintain inclusive, diverse and equitable workplaces throughout our organisation. Our teams should consist of a variety of people that share and combine their knowledge, experience and ideas. Having a diverse workforce leads to a positive impact on how we address challenges, on what we perceive possible and on how we choose to relate to our colleagues and customers all over the world. Hence all diversity dimensions are taken into consideration in our recruitment process.
   

  

 We strive to have a fair and equal process and therefore kindly ask you not to attach a cover letter in your application as they often contain information that easily can trigger unintentional biases.
   

  

****Company Description****
 H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H&M here.

title: Senior IT projektledare
description:
*Är du redo att leda spännande projekt och bidra till Advanias framgång? Vi söker en erfaren Senior Projektledare till vårt nationella projektledarteam!* 



 Senior projektledare på Advania 🚀
 
 Inom Advanias affärsområde Managed Services Provider hjälper vi våra kunder att digitalisera sina verksamheter och optimera sina processer med hjälp av IT-tjänster och teknik. Vi är tjänstefokuserade och arbetar med allt från implementation av public och private cloud-lösningar till skräddarsydda arbetsplats- och supporttjänster som ökar effektiviteten och konkurrenskraften hos våra kunder. Vi tar hand om kundernas IT, så de kan fokusera på sin kärnverksamhet.
 



 I rollen som Senior Projektledare hos oss ansvarar du för att leda och genomföra komplexa IT-projekt från start till mål, med ett fokus på införandeprojekt av tjänsteavtal samt transformationsprojekt för befintliga kunder. Det innebär att du bland annat:
 


* Leder projektleverans och säkerställer att projektmål uppnås inom budget och tidsramar
* Medverkar i upphandlingar och planeringsarbete inför projektstart
* Tillser att projekt planeras och leds i enlighet med etablerad metodik
* Agerar coach och bollplank till yngre kollegor
* Bidrar till att utveckla Advanias projektmetoder och arbetssätt



 Du blir en del av ett erfaret team av projektledare som ansvarar för samtliga projekt inom affärsområdet.
   




 Vad vi söker hos dig ✨
 
 För att du ska trivas och passa hos oss söker vi dig som har en gedigen bakgrund inom IT-projektledning och en bred teknisk förståelse, med erfarenhet av införande av IT-tjänster. Du arbetar idag som senior Projektledare eller Program Manager, gärna med teknisk inriktning. Vi tror att du motiveras av att leda framgångsrika projekt, lösa komplexa problem och samarbeta nära både kunder, interna team och teknik. Du uppskattar en prestigefri arbetsmiljö där innovation och samarbete står i centrum, och där du kan vara nära den dagliga leveransen.
 



 Vi söker dig som har:
 


* Minst 10 års erfarenhet av IT-projektledning, med fokus på IT-tjänster
* Mycket god förståelse för IT-drift och tjänster inom infrastruktur, arbetsplats och support
* Dokumenterad projektledarutbildning, gärna med certifiering inom exempelvis PRINCE2, PPS eller PROPS
* God kommunikationsförmåga, flytande svenska och engelska


 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan! 👋
 
 Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och synsätt, eftersom vi vet att en bredare mångfald berikar var och en av oss och stärker såväl effektivitet som kreativitet i vårt arbete.
 



 Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll, en för oss kvalitativ kontroll inför ett anställningsbeslut.
 



 Tveka inte att höra av dig om du har några frågor eller funderingar.

title: Senior IT projektledare
description:
*Är du redo att leda spännande projekt och bidra till Advanias framgång? Vi söker en erfaren Senior Projektledare till vårt nationella projektledarteam!* 



 Senior projektledare på Advania 🚀
 
 Inom Advanias affärsområde Managed Services Provider hjälper vi våra kunder att digitalisera sina verksamheter och optimera sina processer med hjälp av IT-tjänster och teknik. Vi är tjänstefokuserade och arbetar med allt från implementation av public och private cloud-lösningar till skräddarsydda arbetsplats- och supporttjänster som ökar effektiviteten och konkurrenskraften hos våra kunder. Vi tar hand om kundernas IT, så de kan fokusera på sin kärnverksamhet.
 



 I rollen som Senior Projektledare hos oss ansvarar du för att leda och genomföra komplexa IT-projekt från start till mål, med ett fokus på införandeprojekt av tjänsteavtal samt transformationsprojekt för befintliga kunder. Det innebär att du bland annat:
 


* Leder projektleverans och säkerställer att projektmål uppnås inom budget och tidsramar
* Medverkar i upphandlingar och planeringsarbete inför projektstart
* Tillser att projekt planeras och leds i enlighet med etablerad metodik
* Agerar coach och bollplank till yngre kollegor
* Bidrar till att utveckla Advanias projektmetoder och arbetssätt



 Du blir en del av ett erfaret team av projektledare som ansvarar för samtliga projekt inom affärsområdet.
   




 Vad vi söker hos dig ✨
 
 För att du ska trivas och passa hos oss söker vi dig som har en gedigen bakgrund inom IT-projektledning och en bred teknisk förståelse, med erfarenhet av införande av IT-tjänster. Du arbetar idag som senior Projektledare eller Program Manager, gärna med teknisk inriktning. Vi tror att du motiveras av att leda framgångsrika projekt, lösa komplexa problem och samarbeta nära både kunder, interna team och teknik. Du uppskattar en prestigefri arbetsmiljö där innovation och samarbete står i centrum, och där du kan vara nära den dagliga leveransen.
 



 Vi söker dig som har:
 


* Minst 10 års erfarenhet av IT-projektledning, med fokus på IT-tjänster
* Mycket god förståelse för IT-drift och tjänster inom infrastruktur, arbetsplats och support
* Dokumenterad projektledarutbildning, gärna med certifiering inom exempelvis PRINCE2, PPS eller PROPS
* God kommunikationsförmåga, flytande svenska och engelska


 Vi ser fram emot din ansökan! 👋
 
 Visa gärna ditt intresse så snart som möjligt då vi intervjuar löpande. Vi välkomnar sökanden med olika bakgrunder, erfarenheter och synsätt, eftersom vi vet att en bredare mångfald berikar var och en av oss och stärker såväl effektivitet som kreativitet i vårt arbete.
 



 Som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess genomgår våra slutkandidater en obligatorisk bakgrundskontroll, en för oss kvalitativ kontroll inför ett anställningsbeslut.
 



 Tveka inte att höra av dig om du har några frågor eller funderingar.

title: Group Manager - Scania Maintenance IT
description:
The Scania Maintenance IT team is now looking for two new servant managers. You will support and develop the team in line with our strategy; driving the transformation to a modern digital eco system, working close with Sales & Marketing and developing awesome teams. Now is the perfect time for you to join this exciting journey! We are looking to fill one permanent position and one temporary position.
   

  

 Within Scania Maintenance we work with modernizing our systems and offering, where our cloud solution is being developed and implemented in markets. At the same time we are phasing out our legacy system on-premise and looking at the possibilities we have with AI and Machine Learning to enhance our solution.
   

  

 We work tightly together with the product management organisation. With teams consisting of members from both the IT groups and Sales & marketing groups. You will closely work with 2 other managers from IT and 2 managers from Sales & Marketing.
   

  

 We work in an exciting multicultural environment so you will be speaking English daily. We strongly believe that a diversity of perspectives, ideas and cultures lead to the creation of inspiring work environment and first-class services.
   

  

**Your profile**
 To succeed in this role, you should be a servant leader, where you enable the teams to succeed with their deliveries.
   

  

 You communicate expectations and know that feedback is crucial in driving the development of both teams and individuals. Based on business and IT strategies, you support the team to deliver value, define and reach short and long-term targets. You are a strong believer in psychological safety and develop people to give them the prerequisites to grow. You understand your team’s deliveries and it is natural to you to have a close dialogue with the business.
   

  

 You have a good knowledge and experience from software development environment and agile culture, which enables you to participate in technical discussions in order to support the team to build a qualitative product. You probably have an IT education on university level and/or equivalent experience, but it is not a must.
   

  

**What We Offer**
 Scania is on a journey with a strong purpose: to drive the shift towards a sustainable transport system. To get there, we have gathered a diverse team with talented and fun colleagues, endless development opportunities and good work-life balance. We work a mix of remote and in office. Our offices are activity based with a lot of creative spaces in Södertälje, and we also have a new office hub close to the central station in Stockholm. Furthermore, you are offered annual bonus, lunch to reduced prices, wellness contribution and much more.
   

  

 The recruitment team will consist of team members that will belong to your group, your closest manager colleague and the hiring manager. If you have any questions please contact Sara Gotthardsson, sara.gotthardsson@scania.com.
   

  

 You are very welcome with your application at the latest 22th of June.
   

  

 A background check might be conducted on the final candidate.

title: Engineering Manager - Open application
description:
**Your leadership will make a difference.**
 At Volvo Cars, we are always looking for world-class leaders who bring out the best in our people. If you want to be part of leading and inspiring our mission to change the automotive experience and make people’s lives less complicated, then we have the job for you.
   

  

 What's in it for you?
   

  

 Volvo Cars is driving towards an ambitious future focusing on electrification, autonomous driving, safety and sustainability. Our journey is fueled by a number of things but most importantly it is powered by software, data, and continuous innovation. If this sounds interesting and is something you would like to be a part of, then now is a perfect time to join our team! We are looking for an Engineering Manager to be part of the Commercial Digital team, where we focus on making people fall and stay in love with Volvo through relevant and meaningful content that makes their electrified lives easier.
   

  

 Given that our cars are becoming smarter day by day and imagining what the future might hold for car owners when it comes to software offers, the scope of our team is getting only bigger, more exciting and challenging. You'll be joining a team that values honesty, integrity, trust, and seeks every opportunity to learn and grow while having fun along the way. We are a group of skilled people, currently engaged in agile product development. We want everyone on our team to think and act as an owner. Owners think about things holistically and proactively do what is necessary to achieve success.
   

  

 They own their outcomes and never brush away issues even if it's not in their direct domain.The Daily Usage cluster, part of the Commercial Digital area, has the mission to create products and solutions that empower our customers and provide better everyday Volvo experiences, unlocking car and home potential, and facilitating the transition to an electric living, all while driving global growth with Volvo Cars.This position is working out of our office in Gothenburg, Stockholm or Lund with an office first, but flexible, policy.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Guide and grow a team of engineers through hiring, mentoring, inspiring, and feedback.
* Ensure through streamlined execution and experimentation that our solutions meet the needs of our customers quickly and accurately
* Be the voice of engineering in the Product team through a friendly and effective collaboration with the product and UX counterparts
* Advocate and advance modern, agile software development and develop and facilitate good engineering practices.
* Participate in technical discussions and provide guidance toward high quality solutions.
* As an Engineering leader, you will assist ensure the solutions are scalable, sustainable, and architecturally sound, and technical debt is both incurred consciously and repaid in a reasonable time.
* Be a motivated member of the Cluster engineering leadership team and collaborate with other leaders across the cluster.


**You And Your Skills**
* We are looking for a person that enjoys guiding, developing, inspiring, and growing an engineering team, and has previous experience doing so; you have been an engineering manager before this and know what it takes to build a phenomenal team.
* You are someone that possesses a deep understanding of how to translate product and business goals into sound technical solutions and can mentor your team in this.
* You are knowledgeable and enthusiastic about modern software development that builds products our customers are invested in.
* Prior to starting a technical leadership career, you have had extensive experience working hands-on as a Software Engineer in an agile environment.
* As a great leader, you possess compassion, understand that every individual and situation has its specific needs, and can adapt leadership style and interactions accordingly. Having fun at work is important, and you take great care in making sure everyone always feels welcome and included!


 We offer our employees great benefits such as:
   

  

* Plenty of leave to let you take time off for what's most important in life
* Collective Agreement and ITP pensions
* An annual allowance to spend on your health and wellbeing


*Interested? We welcome your application. Our process is open, and we will contact you should a suitable role matching your profile become available.*
**Who are we?**
 Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones and the people around them.
   

  

 Volvo Cars’ continued success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. The people of Volvo Cars are committed to making a difference in our world. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with over 40,000 employees across the globe. We believe in bringing out the best in each other and harnessing the true power of people. At Volvo Cars your career is designed around your talents and aspirations so you can reach your full potential. Join us on a journey of a lifetime as we create safety, autonomous driving and electrification technologies of tomorrow.

title: Inköpare inom IT till ledande telecombolag i Kista
description:
Är du en driven och erfaren inköpare inom IT? Vill du vara med och optimera värde och minimera risker hos ett av Sveriges största telecombolag? Sök tjänsten idag och bli en del av detta engagerade team!
 



  

**Plats :**
 Kista
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Ekonomi/juridik/inköp
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Så snart som möjligt, juni.
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Som Inköpare inom IT blir du en viktig del av IT-upphandlingsteamet, bestående av fyra kompetenta kollegor. Du arbetar med att hantera och optimera leverantörsavtal inom IT, identifiera besparingsmöjligheter och stötta interna intressenter.
   

 Du kommer att ha en nyckelroll i att genomföra kategoristrategier för olika IT-domäner, inklusive hårdvara, mjukvara, molnlösningar och outsourcing. Tjänsten är på heltid där du börjar som konsult hos Academic Work med en ambition att bli överrekryterad till kundföretaget på sikt.
   




**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Hantera kontrakt och förhandlingar med leverantörer inom IT-kategorier.
  
* Bygga och underhålla starka leverantörsrelationer.
  
* Samarbeta med kategorichefer och interna intressenter för att identifiera besparingsmöjligheter.
  
* Utveckla och implementera strategier för upphandling inom IT.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* 2-5 års erfarenhet av upphandling, inom nätverk eller IT
  
* Erfarenhet av kontraktshantering och olika avtalstyper
  
* Relevant utbildning för tjänsten
  
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska då arbetet utförs på båda språken
   

 Kunskap kan erhållas genom utbildning, erfarenhet eller att vara självlärd.
  


  


  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**



  

  
* Samarbetsinriktad
  
* Strukturerad
  
* Problemlösande
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och annonsen kan därmed komma att tas ned innan sista ansökningsdag om det är så att vi har gått vidare till urvals- och intervjufas. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Viktoria Ullman eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på stw04@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15104670

title: Säkerhetsanalytiker
description:
I en föränderlig omvärld ökar hoten och riskerna inom cybersäkerhet. Detta gäller även oss på Apoteket och där vi behöver rätt personer på plats. Vi utökar och förstärker vårt team IT-säkerhet ytterligare med en säkerhetsanalytiker. Det är här du kommer in!
   

  

 Säkerhetsanalytiker på Apoteket
   

  

 Som säkerhetsanalytiker kommer du att tillhöra Apotekets enhet Drift & Säkerhet. I din roll kommer du arbeta nära de andra inom IT-säkerhet men också vara länken till Apotekets verksamhet och vår SOC tjänsteleverantör. Det är du som kommer att ta emot ärenden med eventuella incidenter, analysera dessa och granska om det är faktiskt hot som vi behöver gå vidare med. Är det en faktiskt IT-säkerhetsincident kommer du sedan vara ansvarig att interagera med relevant del av verksamheten samt systemansvariga, du kommer själv vara en del av incidenthanteringsprocessen.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsområden
   

  

* Arbeta med SIEM (ELK, Cortex), logganalys och andra olika säkerhetsverktyg, exempelvis inom sårbarhetskontroll.
* Arbeta med EDR verktyg från Palo Alto
* Vara stöd till övriga i säkerhetsteamet i olika uppgifter
* Följa KPI:er som visar Apotekets förbättring eller försämring inom exempelvis IT-säkerhetsmognad
* Delta i agil planering för åtgärdsarbeten


 Dina kompetenser
   

  

 Vi letar efter dig som har en eftergymnasialutbildning inom exempelvis datateknik och IT-säkerhet. Du ska även ha arbetat i några år med IT-säkerhet och har erfarenhet av Logganalys i SIEM och MITRE ramverket.
   

  

 Utöver detta vill vi att du:
   

  

* Har arbetat med nätverksteknik
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på både svenska och engelska
* Är strukturerad och noggrann i ditt arbetssätt
* Kan bibehålla ett lugn och effektivitet under stressiga och utmanade perioder
* Är analytisk i din problemlösningsförmåga och utifrån det kan fatta egna beslut
* Är tydlig och rak i både skriftlig och muntlig kommunikation samt förstår vikten av att skapa förståelse hos andra


 Det är fördelaktigt om du har arbetat i andra roller inom IT/Tech och har arbetat med incidenthantering tidigare.
   

  

  

**När det känns rätt**
 Fundera inte för länge. Låt oss istället berätta om rollen och om verksamheten så kan du sen avgöra om det känns rätt för dig. Ansök nu!
   

  

 Urval och intervjuer sker löpande och tjänsten kan tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum.
   

  

 Välkommen till Apoteket!

title: Produktägare Power BI
description:
*Ta steget mot en bredare ansvarsroll som produktägare för Power BI och var med och forma framtidens lösningar inom området. Bli en del av vårt framgångsrika och innovativa team och arbeta med den senaste tekniken inom Power BI.*
**Om jobbet**
 Som produktägare för lösningsområdet Power BI får du möjligheten att utforma och skapa ett nytt, gemensamt kompetenscenter. Du kommer att vara organisationens möjliggörare och ha stor påverkanskraft över den framtida funktionen för Power BI. Det är en spännande och ansvarsfull roll där du blir en del av ett dynamiskt och innovativt team.
   

  

 Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter i denna roll är följande:
   

  

* Utforma och skapa ett nytt, gemensamt kompetenscenter för Power BI.
* Fungera som organisationens möjliggörare för användningen av Power BI.
* Påverka och forma den framtida funktionen för Power BI.


**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig med tidigare erfarenhet som Power BI-utvecklare eller teknisk specialist, som nu vill ta steget mot en bredare ansvarsroll. Alternativt söker vi dig med erfarenhet av att etablera och driva ett kompetenscenter inom beslutstödsområdet. Du förväntas ha tillräckliga förkunskaper för att vara organisationens fokalpunkt för Power BI-användning, proaktivt stödja användningen inom hela länsförsäkringsgruppen, driva tekniska krav gentemot underleverantörer och ansvara för specialistresurser.
   

  

 Kvalifikationer:
   

  

* Akademisk examen inom IT eller motsvarande.
* Tekniskt kunnig med starka problemlösningsförmågor.
* Kunskap och erfarenhet om Power BI on-prem och Power BI i molnet.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Microsoft-teknologier som Microsoft Azure, M365 och övriga komponenter i powerplatformen.
* Erfarenhet av IT-projektledning.


 Egenskaper och färdigheter:
   

  

* Kommunikativ förmåga för att agera som brygga mellan användare, Länsförsäkringar AB IT och leverantörer.
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.
* Förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och i team.


**Om oss**
 Vi erbjuder en spännande och utvecklande roll där du får vara med och forma framtidens lösningar inom Power BI. Du kommer att vara en del av ett framgångsrikt och innovativt team och arbeta med den senaste tekniken inom området. Om du är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och vill vara med och driva utvecklingen inom Power BI, ser vi fram emot att höra från dig. Ansök nu och bli en del av vårt team som produktägare för vårt lösningsområde med fokus på Power BI.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-06-24**

title: Project Engineering Lead
description:
**Job Description**
**Are You Ready to Make It Happen at Mondelēz International?**
**Join our Mission to Lead the Future of Snacking. Make It With Pride.**
 To support growth, world-class manufacturing and productivity, you manage the detailed planning, development and execution of capital projects, leading technical development, feasibility perspectives on engineering-related activities within the supply chain, and capital expense project execution meeting the highest levels of quality, safety and environmental requirements. You follow Mondelēz business and innovation processes in project management and ensure adherence to Mondelēz standards in execution.
   

  

**How You Will Contribute**
 Working with key stakeholders, you will define and deliver the capital and technical agenda during the development phase of mid to large capital investment projects so that accurate budgets, plans and fit-for-purpose technical solutions are provided. You will develop the capital budget according to the contract and forecast cash flow. In addition, you will ensure that engineering developments and standards are implemented and develop and implement state-of-the-art processes and equipment strategies to optimize resources, harmonize assets and rollout best practices. You are responsible for managing several capital project executions in parallel and accountable that the quality and the results of capital projects meet Mondelēz standards in business and innovation processes in project management. You manage engineering resources and people management and development needs.
   

  

**What You Will Bring**
 A desire to drive your future and accelerate your career. You will bring experience and knowledge in:
   

  

* Significant engineering and operations experience
* Project management
* Leading to work effectively across cross-functional teams and influencing key stakeholders
* Technical expertise across engineering disciplines and high expertise in one or more domains


**More About This Role**
**Work schedule: 100%**
**Relocation Support Available?**
 No Relocation support available
   

  

**Business Unit Summary**
 We value our talented employees, and whenever possible strive to help one of our associates grow professionally before recruiting new talent to our open positions. If you think the open position you see is right for you, we encourage you to apply!
   

  

*Our people make all the difference in our succes*
 Mondelēz International is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation or preference, gender identity, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
   

  

**Excited to grow your career?**
 We value our talented employees, and whenever possible strive to help one of our associates grow professionally before recruiting new talent to our open positions. If you think the open position you see is right for you, we encourage you to apply!
   

  

**IF YOU REQUIRE SUPPORT TO COMPLETE YOUR APPLICATION OR DURING THE INTERVIEW PROCESS, PLEASE CONTACT THE RECRUITER**
**Job Type**
 Regular
   

  

 Project Engineering
   

  

 Science & Engineering

title: Sales Executive
description:
**Plats:** 
  Stockholm, distans/hybrid 
 



  





**Om rollen:** 




  





 Som Sales Executive kommer du att spela en avgörande roll i att uppnå och överträffa företages försäljningsmål, generera nya möjligheter i pipeline och bidra till Idegos övergripande tillväxtmål i Norden. Följ med oss på denna spännande resa och bli en nyckelpåverkare i att forma vår organisations framtid.
 



  





 Vi söker en dynamisk och driven B2B-Sales Executive som kommer ansvara över den svenska marknaden. Den primära uppgiften i denna roll är att identifiera och engagera potentiella kunder för våra IT-konsulttjänster. Om du har en passion för IT och affärer, tillsammans med drivkraften och engagemanget att vårda befintliga kundrelationer och skapa nya affärsmöjligheter, erbjuder vi dig en utmanande roll med stora utvecklingsmöjligheter.
 



  





**Om Idego** 
 : 
 



  





 Idego är ett internationellt IT-konsultbolag med huvudkontor i Polen och har etablerat sin verksamhet i flera länder, inklusive USA, Polen, Tyskland och Sverige. Företaget erbjuder expertis och tjänster inom informationsteknologi, vilket innebär att de stödjer företag med tekniska lösningar och konsulttjänster för att förbättra deras IT-infrastruktur och affärsprocesser. Idego specialiserar sig på att utveckla skräddarsydda mjukvarulösningar för företag i olika branscher. Med en stark kompetens inom områden som artificiell intelligens, maskininlärning, och avancerad dataanalys, hjälper Idego sina kunder att optimera verksamhetsprocesser och driva innovation. Företaget erbjuder ett brett utbud av tjänster, inklusive konsultation, utveckling, och support, och strävar efter att bygga långsiktiga partnerskap med sina klienter. Idego är känt för sin kundcentrerade approach och sitt engagemang för att leverera högkvalitativa lösningar som möter specifika affärsbehov och mål.
 



  





**Nyckelansvar:** 




  




* Identifiera och engagera potentiella kunder för våra tjänster (IT-konsulttjänster).
* Utveckla och implementera strategiska försäljningsplaner.
* Hantera hela säljtratten, från leadhantering och prospektering till mötesplanering och avslutande av affärer.
* Bygga och underhålla starka relationer med nya kunder.
* Uppnå tillväxt och nå försäljningsmål.
* Arbeta självständigt med fullt ansvar och befogenhet.
* Använda Idegos hela portfölj av konsulttjänster.
* Samarbeta med vårt team för att anpassa tjänsteerbjudanden till marknadens behov.
* Delta i ledningsgruppen och bidra till utvecklingen av Sverige-kontoret.
* Hjälpa till att driva företaget framåt med ett entreprenörstänk.
* Ge marknadsfeedback för att förbättra våra tjänster och vårt tillvägagångssätt.



  





**Kvalifikationer:** 




  




* Minst 4års erfarenhet av B2B-försäljning, med dokumenterad framgång i att uppnå tillväxt och vinna nya affärer.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt på ett strukturerat och systematiskt sätt, med tydliga planer och alternativ.
* Motiverad, energisk och målorienterad.
* Utmärkta kommunikations- och förhandlingsegenskaper.
* Modersmålsnivå på svenska och full professionell kunskap i engelska.
* IT-utbildning är meriterande.
* Förmåga att vara med i en ledningsgrupp och bidra till företagets utveckling.
* Entreprenörstänk med ett etablerat nätverk.



  





**Förmåner:** 




  





 ·      Konkurrenskraftig, marknadsbaserad lön med provision.
 



 ·      Kontinuerlig professionell utveckling och tillväxtmöjligheter. 
 



 ·      Dynamisk och samarbetsvillig arbetsmiljö med möjlighet att påverka.
 



  





**Din profil:** 




  





 Vi förväntar oss att du har en dokumenterat god förmåga att skapa och underhålla lönsamma affärsrelationer. Som person är du vetgirig, kreativ och trivs med att identifiera nya affärsmöjligheter.
 



  





 Du bör vara en person med god kommunikativ förmåga, målmedveten, strukturerad MEN framför allt resultatorienterad för att lyckas väl i denna roll. Idego är ett framåtlutande IT konsultbolag och kulturen präglas av ambitiösa medarbetare som drivs av att bolaget skall fortsätta sin lönsamma tillväxtresa och vara en ledande aktör inom sin bransch. Vi ser gärna att du har goda kunskaper inom något eller några av de ämnesområden som vi är verksamma inom. Ett stort befintligt nätverk med relevanta kontakter inom branschen, är meriterande.
 



  





 Om du är redo att ta dig an utmaningen och representera ett väletablerat internationellt IT bolag, skicka in ditt CV och ett personligt brev där du beskriver varför du är den perfekta kandidaten för rollen som Sales Executive hos oss. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
 



  





 Vill du veta mer om oss, besök gärna: https://idego-group.com/

title: Domänarkitekt
description:
*Vill du vara med och forma framtidens IT-arkitektur för att möjliggöra effektiv systemutveckling? Vi söker en domänarkitekt till gruppen Effektiv Systemutveckling (ESU) som kan vara med och säkerställa rätt IT-stöd för IT-utveckling och bli en del av vår framåtlutade gruppering.*
**Om jobbet**
 Vi söker en erfaren domänarkitekt som kommer att spela en viktig roll inom vår grupp Effektiv systemutveckling.
   

  

 Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter inom denna roll är följande:
   

  

* Ansvara för framtagande av förvaltnings- och utvecklingsplaner inom domänen/leveransområdet Effektiv systemutveckling och säkra genomförandet tillsammans med gruppens Product Owners.
* Driva framtagandet, dokumentation och förankring av arkitekturella målbilder och färdplaner för gruppens leveransområde som omfattar förmågor inom IT-utveckling inklusive kvalitetssäkring/test.
* Ta fram och presentera lösningsbeskrivningar i arkitekturrådet och andra forum.
* Säkerställa förankring av gruppens bidrag till framtidens IT-arkitektur.
* Samverka och kommunicera med aktuella målgrupper dels inom den egna grupperingen, dels inom avdelningen, enheten och andra affärsenheter.
* Samverka och utbyta erfarenheter med andra domänarkitekter och chefsarkitekter.
* Coacha lösningsarkitekter och bidra i relaterade lösningsdiskussioner.


**Vem är du?**
 Kvalifikationer:
   

  

* 10+ års relevant arbetserfarenhet.
* Erfaren system- och lösningsarkitekt och/eller senior DevOps engineer.
* Ramverk som SAFe, TOGAF och IASA.
* Vana att modellera arkitektur.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med roadmaps och ta fram beslutsunderlag.
* Erfarenhet av digital transformation och molnförflyttningar.
* Branscherfarenhet inom bank och finans.
* Akademisk utbildning med en teknisk inriktning.
* Svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


 Teknisk kompetens:
   

  

* God förståelse för IT-utveckling och modern systemutveckling (CI/CD pipelines, byggagenter, automation, Azure DevOps).
* God förståelse för nödvändiga förmågor för IT-utveckling och kvalitetssäkring/testning.
* Cloud-teknologier (Azure, AWS, Kubernetes etc.).
* Hantering av testdata, IT-säkerhet och operations.


 Meriterande kvalifikationer:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av arkitekturverktyg, gärna Sparx Enterprise Architect och LeanIX och processutveckling inom IT.


 Egenskaper och färdigheter:
   

  

* God kommunikationsförmåga i tal och skrift.
* Kan vara en brygga mellan affär/verksamhet och teknik/IT.
* Engagerad och drivs av hög förändringstakt.
* Förmåga att se helheten med intresse för detaljer.
* Vara samarbetsvillig, skicklig på kommunikation, engagerad och anpassningsbar till förändringstakt.


 Målsättningen med rollen som domänarkitekt är att vara en central aktör i att forma och driva framtidens IT-arkitektur inom IT-utvecklingsområdet. Du kommer att ansvara för att säkra molnresan för leveransen, hålla koll på omvärlden och stödja andra roller i gruppen med arkitekturfrågor. Dessutom kommer du att representera gruppen i olika sammanhang med tekniskt fokus. Du kommer ingå i avdelningens arkitekturforum och råd som leds av chefsarkitekt.
   

  

**Om oss**
 Gruppen Effektiv systemutveckling (ESU) ingår i avdelningen Gemensamma system och är en del av enheten Digital & IT. ESU är en framåtlutad grupp som präglas av en positiv och samarbetsvillig kultur. Gruppen Effektiv systemutveckling består av cirka 30 medarbetare med olika roller såsom Product Owner, DevOps Engineer och Lean Agil Coach. Oavsett roll arbetar vi alla mot samma mål för att möjliggöra hög digital kvalitet och effektiv IT-utveckling och säkerställa både nöjda medarbetare och kunder.
   

  

 Gruppchef Charlotta Haldin: Som ledare fokuserar jag på att skapa rätt förutsättningar och jag litar på att mina team alltid gör sitt bästa. Jag tror på öppenhet och individens förmåga att prestera och leverera värde tillsammans med andra. Jag tror på ständigt lärande och vet att innovation kräver mod och misslyckanden. Som grupp är vi engagerade, stolta över vår prestation och vi har roligt tillsammans.
   

  

 Hos oss får du möjlighet att vara en del av en grupp som spelar en central roll inom IT-utveckling och bidrar till framtidens IT-arkitektur.
   

  

**Mer information**
*Låter det som att du är rätt person? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
*Rekryteringensprocessen tar en paus under sommarsemestern och återkoppling gällande din ansökan väntas ske i augusti. Tack för ditt tålamod och vi önskar dig en trevlig sommar!*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-09-02**

title: ADS Architect
description:
Want to be part of transforming road freight – for good? Einride is showing the world a new way to move, based on the latest digital, electric and autonomous technologies. Through freight capacity as a service, we enable businesses around the world to accelerate towards their sustainability goals.
   

  

 Founded in 2016, Einride became the first company in the world to deploy a cab-less autonomous electric vehicle on a public road (Sweden, 2019). In 2022, we were the first to successfully operate such a vehicle on a US public road. Today our award-winning technology has been launched across 8 countries (and counting). Our clients are some of the world’s biggest shippers, including Fortune 500 companies.
   

  

 We are looking for enthusiastic, humble and creative ADS architects who are passionate about creating simple, beautiful and helpful solutions to empower the public and the transport business. As an ADS architect at Einride, you will join one of our top talent teams where you will have the opportunity to innovate and drive change together with other ambitious, innovative and kind-hearted people who all challenge conventional thinking.
   

  

 What you'll do
   

  

* On a functional level, define ADS Capabilities and map them to product definition and customer needs
* Represent a technical domain area in the complete ADS architecture definition
* Break-down of ADS level architecture and requirements to domain level
* Work with domain teams to align architectures and technical solutions


 What we're looking for
   

  

* Experience in working with complex systems
* Basic knowledge and understanding of system safety in automotive or similar contexts
* In-depth knowledge in at least one technical domain area of the ADS stack
* Experience and basic understanding of V&V of software or vehicle functionality in a complex system


 Bonus skills
   

  

* Previous experience in working with MBSE and related tools


 We recommend you submit your application as soon as possible as selection and interviews are held continuously.
   

  

 At Einride, we are innovators, building solutions the world has never seen before – but urgently needs. That’s why we take action, and it’s why we are always eager to be challenged. We know that our best innovations come from having a diverse mix of people, including those of different experiences, career paths, and walks of life. By coming together and sharing our perspectives openly – by disagreeing, discussing, and committing – we deliver greater impact.

title: Internal Auditor
description:
**Would you like to perform audits to look for risks around the world?**
 Internal Audit in TRATON Financial Services is the last line of defence in making sure we comply with internal and external regulation, as well as making sure that conceivable risks are under control. We do this by performing audits on credit, anti-money-laundering and other relevant topics.
   

  

 Covering risks in 50 plus companies that have different brands, financial products, systems and process is a challenge and it requires you to be curious, structured and disciplined. Our vision of how to do this is to have data pipelines to all entities and algorithms that detect emerging risks.
   

  

 Most audits will have familiar objectives and a degree of routine but some are totally new topics where we first need to understand the topic and associated risks.
   

  

 You do not need to be a financial services expert to be a great auditor, but you need have the drive to acquire the information you need as well as skills and experience in analysing data and documents.
   

  

**Responsibilities as Internal Auditor:**
* Perform audits, routine or new topics, at Traton Financial Services companies around the world to verify that policies are followed and that risks are subject to effective controls
* On occasion manage and lead audit projects from ensuring that audit objectives are met within the defined timeline and with adherence to our processes
* Ensure that we are covering the most relevant risks in the audit plan and in the audits, i.e. build a deep understanding of the commercial vehicle financing industry and apply creative thinking to find out what might have been missed
* Participate in the development of and execute on the internal audit plan and programs that identify and assess risks to our company's governance, risk management, compliance, and internal control processes
* Prepare and present reports on audit findings and recommendations to senior management and other stakeholders


**Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree in accounting, finance, business administration, law, science or a related field
* Minimum 3 years’ experience from automotive industry, captive financing or auditing/controlling/accounting within the financial services sector
* Ability to write clear and crisp texts about complex topics
* Ability to visualize data in charts and presentations that are structured, uncluttered and follow our visual identity
* Fluency in other languages is a great advantage
* Proficiency in Excel and Word, proficiency in Power BI is a plus
* Project management experience from projects with multiple participants is a is a plus
* Ability to deal with new and complex topics. Proficiency in mind maps or other ways to create structure is a plus
* Track record of identifying potential issues in data is a plus
* Ability to travel internationally


**We offer**
 Development and opportunities for international travel and meeting colleagues from around the world as well as benefits such as private lease car, pension, flexible working hours and working from distance, lunch at reduced prices and more. Join our dynamic and growing team today and take the first step towards an exciting career in TRATON financial services!
   

  

**Further information**
 If you have any questions regarding this recruitment process please contact
   

  

 Camilla Lövgren, Chief Audit Executive, TRATON Financial Services Audit, +46 8 553 806 27. Note that if selected for an interview you will be asked to submit a small case study to help assess the requirements above.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV, a personal cover letter and copies of any relevant certificates. Apply via Scania’s career website. Interviews will be held continuously and we will therefore need your application in English as soon as possible.
   

  

 Please apply through our website HR Inline/Job search at Scania as soon as possible and no later than August 12h. Not that we will start the recruitment process immediately and might decide to close the process earlier in case we find the right candidate. Since it's almost vacation, this process will unfortunately take a little longer over the summer weeks.
   

  

 We look forward to your application!

title: IT Business Process Manager - SAP Sales and Distribution
description:
**Solve complex problems. Decode the future.**
 At Electrolux Group, as a leading global appliance company, we strive every day to shape living for the better for our consumers, our people and our planet. We share ideas and collaborate so that together, we can develop solutions that deliver enjoyable and sustainable living.
   

  

 Come join us as you are. We believe diverse perspectives make us stronger and more innovative. In our global community of people from 100+ countries, we listen to each other, actively contribute, and grow together.
   

  

 Join us in our exciting quest to build the future home.
   

  

**All about the role:**
 As a IT Business Process Manager - SAP Sales and Distribution, you will be responsible for analyzing the business needs, for assisting in the identification of business problems and/or process gaps, and for proposing and delivering solutions.
   

  

 You will be part of the Sales Process Solutions EA team.
   

  

**What you'll do:**
* Using your expertise in representing the entire sales team towards business programs such as D2C Sales, B2B Sales, Aftermarket, Manufacturing, business transformation.
* Participate in application implementation projects.
* In cooperation with the business, propose business process driven IT solutions with high operational and cost effectiveness, where applicable.
* Analyze and scope the area of analysis, working with project managers and business sponsors to clarify the level and complexity of the business analysis effort needed for IT related projects.
* Produce presentations on analysis, design, and solutions, communicate them in a professional way.
* Maintain continuous business and internal team interaction and relationships.
* Keep up to date knowledge on external and internal process excellence.


**Who you are:**
* Strong Performer, willing to work in a high pressure and delivery-oriented team.
* Multitasking: able to manage multiple projects in a fast -paced, deadline-driven environment.
* Autonomous: able to work independently and focus on deliverables.
* Team player: you enjoy working in cross-cultural and geographically distributed teams.
* Flexible: you have the ability to deal with uncertainty and work in a stressful situation whilst remaining calm and clear thinking
* Structured and organized


**Qualifications** 
**:**
* Detailed knowledge & configuration of SAP SD applications and principles (SOM, Pricing, Billing), or proven equivalent experience in other SAP modules (e.g. MM, WM, FI) and willingness to expand knowledge of SD.
* Experience in working with application end users to determine and document functional requirements for application software and database.
* Good understanding of touchpoints into related SAP modules (e.g. FI, CO, LE, WM, PI)
* Familiar in searching for OSS notes etc.
* Familiar with multiple database systems and software development processes.
* Experience in writing technical & functional documentation.
* Strong ABAP reading/debugging skills.
* Familiar with SAP Contact Center.
* Clear communicator in both verbal and written communications – both at technical level and business level.
* Very good command of English.


**Where you'll be:**
 You will be based at Electrolux office in Stockholm, Sweden.
   

  

 Alternative location is Kraków, Poland.
   

  

**Benefit highlights include:**
* Flexible work hours/hybrid work environment.
* Attractive social benefits package.
* Extensive learning opportunities and flexible career path.


 We look forward to receiving you application!
   

  

 As part of Electrolux, we will continuously invest in you and your development. There are no barriers to where your career could take you.
   

  

**Find out more:**
 Electrolux Group

title: Supply Chain Planner to international company!
description:
Are you a strategic planner with a passion for logistics? We are now looking for a Supply Chain Planner who wants to take the opportunity to become a key player in a global organization and develop with them. The start for this position is immediately - welcome with your application!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Job Category :**
 Warehousing / Logistics
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time, time-limited assignment of 6 months
 



  

**Start date :**
 ASAP
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
   




**About the role**

 As a Supply Chain Planner, your main responsibility is to plan, coordinate, and optimize our packed goods operations at our clients European hub. You will ensure cost-effectiveness and high customer service by managing production planning for drums and IBCs, participating in improvement projects, and assisting the Head of Supply Chain Operations with cost follow-up and invoice management. Additionally, you will handle stock reconciliation and maintain statistical reporting databases. You will also play an active role in matching supply and demand within the NSP Supply Chain Department along with other stakeholders.
 


  


 On a personal level we are seeking for applicants who lives the companies values of dedication, cooperation and proactivity. The candidate has a good basic understanding of logistics and planning, is structured, positive, service minded, resilient, open to changes, flexible and has good social, influencing and diplomatic skills.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* A challenging position in an international setting and a highly motivated team.
  
* The opportunity of making an impact and work closely with dedicated colleagues around the world.
  
* The opportunity to develop within Supply Chain Management.
  

  


**Work tasks**
  
* Planning and optimization of the packed goods operation within the global hub in Antwerp including but not limited to production (filling of packed goods) planning for drums and IBC.
  
* Participation depot/hub improvement projects that have an impact on packed goods.
  
* Assist the Head of Supply Chain Operations with cost follow up and approval of costs/signing of invoices according to delegation.
  
* Synergi deviations related to packed goods and hub related operational and HSSE issues.
  
* Stock reconciliation at the end of each month.
  
* Maintaining statistical reporting database such as inventory levels, truck data, timeslots, demurrage, rejections, no shows, overtimes amongst others.
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* Academic degree, preferably in logistics and/or economics.
  
* Operational background experience. Previous work experience in logistics or the process industry, particularly within the chemical sector or any other company handling bulk liquids, is considered a valuable merit.
  
* Fluent in english. Knowledge in the Swedish or Dutch language is a valuable merit.
  
* Solid knowledge in IT and Microsoft Office applications, especially Excel
  


  


  

**To succeed in the role, your personal skills are:**



  

  
* Structured
  
* Positive and service minded
  
* Good communication, diplomatic and social skills
  
* Self-sufficient
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Molly Rytter or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on stw06@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15104853

title: Country Manager
description:
**Job Title: Country Manager Sweden** 




**Location:** 
 Stockholm, Sweden (Hybrid)
 



  





**About The Company:** 




 A leading specialist in business loans for small and medium-sized enterprises across Europe. In the past 10 years, they have supported thousands of business owners across the Nordics by providing efficient, tailored financing solutions through an advanced digital platform.
 



  





**Their Mission:** 




 To understand the critical role that small and medium-sized businesses play in the economy. By offering the working capital needed, they empower continuous growth. The mission is to move money to the businesses that need it most, using both cutting-edge technology and personalized service from our expert loan advisors.
 



  





**The Offer:** 



* Business loans, account credits, and refinancing options
* Flexible payment periods
* Fast processing of loan applications



  





**Role Overview:** 




 As the Country Manager for Sweden, you will be at the forefront of our operations in this key market. Your primary responsibility will be to drive growth and ensure the successful delivery of our financial solutions to small and medium-sized businesses. You will leverage your deep understanding of B2B lending and your strong network to expand our reach and enhance our customer relationships.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities:** 



* **Lead and manage the Swedish operations** 
 , ensuring alignment with our strategic goals
* Develop and implement strategies to grow our market presence and customer base
* **Build and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders** 
 , including business owners, financial institutions, and industry partners
* Oversee the performance of the Swedish team, providing guidance and support to achieve targets



  





**Qualifications:** 



* Fluent in
 **Swedish** 
 and English
* Based in Stockholm, with the flexibility for a hybrid working arrangement
* Extensive experience in B2B lending, banking, or financial services (experience in payments alone is not sufficient)
* Strong network within the Swedish business and financial community
* Proven track record of leading teams and driving business growth
* Excellent communication, negotiation, and relationship-building skills
* Strong analytical and strategic thinking abilities
* A passion for supporting small and medium-sized businesses



  





**Why Join:** 



* Be part of a dynamic and innovative company that is transforming the financial landscape for small businesses
* Work in a collaborative and supportive environment with opportunities for professional growth
* Make a meaningful impact by helping businesses access the capital they need to succeed



  





**How to Apply:** 




 If you are a strategic leader with a passion for finance and a desire to make a difference, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume detailing your relevant experience via LinkedIn, or to hanna.moeller@storm2.com
